summary: This bill, the Dr. Lorna Breen Health Care Provider Protection Reauthorization Act, reauthorizes and amends the original act. It focuses on mental health support for healthcare professionals. The bill amends the existing law to extend the education and awareness initiative, and programs designed to promote mental health services for healthcare workers. It also includes provisions to reduce administrative burdens on healthcare workers. The reauthorization extends funding for these programs through 2029.
